t:type.name: AlexaCapProperties
t:type.t:description: Represents the properties structure for Alexa V3 capabilities returned in the endpoint structure

t:attribute.name: supported
t:attribute.description: Indicates the properties of the interface which are supported by this endpoint.

t:attribute.name: proactivelyReported
t:attribute.description: Indicates whether the properties listed for this endpoint generate Change.Report events.

t:attribute.name: retrievable
t:attribute.description: Indicates whether the properties listed for this endpoint can be retrieved for state reporting. This MUST not be used for scenes.

t:attribute.name: supportsDeactivation
t:attribute.description: Indicates whether a scene can be run in deactivation mode. This MUST only be used for scenes.
